refsynopsisdiv.title: Methods
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: AuthorizeApp (IN s desktop_id, OUT b authorized);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is the interface all application-authorizing agents must implement. There must be a separate agent object for every logged-in user on path "/org/freedesktop/GeoClue2/Agent/${UID}".

refsect2.title: The AuthorizeApp() method
refsect2.programlisting: AuthorizeApp (IN s desktop_id, OUT b authorized);
refsect2.para: This is the method that will be called by geoclue to get applications authorized to be given location information.

listitem.para: The desktop file id (the basename of the desktop file) of the application requesting location information.
Return value indicating if application should be given location information or not.
